entry.content: Another wonderful day at the official reopening of Doneraile Court last week. The 5th most visited free attraction, Doneraile Court and Gardens is located in the North Cork area of Ballyhoura Country and itâ€™s one of the Irelandâ€™s most popular hidden gems ğŸ’. The â‚¬2m refurbishment of the Doneraile Court by @opwireland opened up the second floor to the public. It is now open 5 days a week until mid June and guided tours are available from 10am to 4pm Wednesday to Sunday and Bank holidays. It will be open 7 days a week from mid June ğŸ™Œâœ¨ #heritageireland #OPW #visitdoneraile #visitballyhoura #castletownhouse #irelandshiddenheartlands #ballyhoura #munstervales #purecork #guidesofireland #visitcork @Munster Vales @Pure Cork @Irelandâ€™s Hidden Heartlands @
